mapper.insert: insert into chatList(user_id, user_name, content, date, sex) values(#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{content}, #{date}, #{sex})
mapper.update: update chatList set count = #{count} where id = #{id}
update chatList set user_name = #{afterUser_name} where user_name = #{beforeUser_name}
update chatList set sex = #{sex} where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select * from chatList where content like #{data}
